casebody.data:
MAYO
v.
NC STATE UNIVERSITY. No. 164A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 16, 2005. Q. Shante Martin, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. State University.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th day of May 2005 by Petitioner for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Petitioner shall have up to and including the 23rd day of June 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 16th day of May 2005."
